institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 19 (review and approval of regular training courses)
contents: Article 19 (Examination and approval of regular training courses) ① If the Chairman determines that it is necessary to open additional training courses, he may have the business group open regular training courses. ② The business group may meet the needs of companies in industrial sites, etc. If it is deemed necessary by taking into account, a regular training course may be opened. ③ The business group must review whether the training course to be opened pursuant to paragraph 1 is suitable for the needs of the industrial field and submit the application documents for the regular training course to the chairman of the board. . ④ Details of the training course, personnel, application, and review for the year for the regular training course pursuant to paragraphs 1 and 2 shall be separately determined by the chairman.
